markdown: -3- IV. COMMISSION ON PRIVATE PHILANTHROPY AND PUBLIC NEEDS (FILER COMMISSION) A. Tax Incentives 1. What changes, if any, are recommended by the Commission regarding tax deductibility, tax credits, or "matching" grants, regarding charitable contributions? 2. Why are these changes recommended? 3. What effect is expected if these recommendations are carried out? B. Legislative Regulation of Charitable Solicitation 1. What is the Commission recommending regarding national, state and/or local control of charitable solicitation? 2. Why? 3. What effects are predicted if these recommendations are carried out? C. Oversight 1. What is the Commission recommending regarding the establishment of a public or quasi-public permanent oversight body to oversee private philanthropy? 2. Why? D. Future Trends in Private Philanthropy 1. Based on the Commission's studies, opinion polls, and personal interviews, what are the commission's conclusions regarding future trends in private philanthropy? Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/jzhd0227
